resolve-with

Sugar method for returning the desired object at the end of a promise chain

resolve-with
Parameters
object (any) the item with which to resolve the promise chain
Returns
function:
Example
var item = {
  prop: 2
};
return Promise
 .resolve(item.prop)
 .then(resolveWith(item));

retry

Makes a promise-returning method retryable according to the specified backoff pattern

retry
Parameters
fn (Function)
options (Object)
Name Description
options.backoff boolean
options.delay number
options.initialDelay number
options.maxAttempts number
options.maxDelay number
Returns
Function:
